Package dao

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDao<T>
    AbstractDao is an abstract class that shares the PostgreSQL connection
    ConnectionPostgreSQL
    ConnectionPostgreSQL knows all the detail about the database connection
    DirectionDao
    DirectionDao is a child of AbstractDao, this class help us find a direction in the database.
    IngredientDao
    IngredientDao is a child of AbstractDao, this class help us find an ingredient in the database.
    RecipeDao
    RecipeDao is a child of AbstractDao, this class help us find a recipe in the database.
    RecipeDaoTasker
    RecipeDaoTasker is a child of AsyncTask, this class help us find a direction in the database.
    ToolDao
    ToolDao is a child of AbstractDao, this class help us find a tool in the database.
